translations: 袭击；（使）感官难受；攻击敌方阵地（assault 的现在分词）

phrs.translation: [律]加重恐吓行为；加重攻击罪

sentences.sentence: He has been charged with assaulting a police officer.
He was charged with indecently assaulting five women.
The police report stated that he was arrested for allegedly assaulting his wife.
sentences.translation: 警方报告称，他因涉嫌殴打妻子而被捕。
